Why don't they just say the truth? It's easy!

\pop[0]I'm here to investigate. We are searching a gangster.
He was last seen here, in Maritime City.
\pop[0]We think he operates during the night, I'm taking a
look. Let me know if you see something suspicious.
\pop[0]Of course. But this is not a detective game, be
careful and don't put yourself in danger.
\pop[0]Talk to me whenever you get valuous information.
\pop[0]Estoy aqu para investigar. Buscamos a un mafioso.
Fue visto por ltima vez aqu, en Ciudad Martima.
\pop[0]Creemos que opera durante la noche, estoy echando un
vistazo. Hzmelo saber si ves algo sospechoso.
\pop[0]Pues claro. Pero esto no es un juego, ten mucho
cuidado y no te pongas en peligro.
\pop[1]Thank you so much! Take this as thanks.
\pop[1]I'm very excited about getting my first Pokmon!
\pop[1]Tengo muchas ganas de obtener mi primer Pokmon!
\pop[0]Why do you look at me like that? It's weird.
\pop[0]Por qu me miras as? Es extrao.
\pop[0]What do you want? .\..\.. Oh, so you work with
the police? And you want information from a Rocket grunt?
\pop[0]You should know that Team Rocket doesn't cooperate
with the police, but we can reach an agreement...
\pop[0]I will give you all the information you want if you
don't tell anyone that I have been here. Deal done?
\pop[0]Cool. Listen, Team Rocket has nothing to do with the
person you are looking for, I swear.
\pop[0]We and the police are in the same side here. There's
a little group of gangsters in the island.
\pop[0]They want to set up a criminal empire and remove us
from the map. They are preparing to start a war against us.
\pop[0]I was here with the same purpose as you, but if police
is doing the work, I'd better leave the place.
\pop[0]Anyway, the guy you are searching is known as Carlo
Gambditto. He's a master of disguise, so he could be anyone!
\pop[0]It will be difficult to find him. That's everything I
\pop[0]And I think you would be a great ally, take this,
just in case you want to switch to the good side.
You received a Team Rocket recommendation card!
\pop[0]I can't say a word then. Good luck in your investigation,
you are going to come back and make the deal, my info is essential.

\pop[0]Estamos en el mismo bando que la polica en esto. Hay
un pequeo grupo de mafiosos en la isla.
\pop[0]Quieren levantar un imperio criminal y eliminarnos
del mapa. Estan preparados para declararnos la guerra.
\pop[0]Estaba aqu con el mismo propsito que t, pero si
